title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies: Portfolio-Based Assessment for Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically document weekly math problem-solving projects in a portfolio over four weeks.
Learners can reflect on their problem-solving processes and suggest improvements based on peer feedback and instructor evaluations.
Learners can develop online collaboration skills to collect, organize, and share portfolio materials using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
